883290.name: MixCast
883290.description:
MixCast is the best way to create, share and broadcast mixed reality content to any audience, with almost any equipment, VR app, or filming environment.



Getting started is easy; MixCast Studio will guide you through each of the three setup steps (Camera Selection, Background Removal, and Camera Alignment) so that you can start creating MR content within minutes.




With the all new WildKey™ feature, you can now remove your background with or without a green screen. Whether you’re in a green screen studio, a busy conference booth, or your own living room, MixCast has a background removal option that fits your setup. As of 2.0, we now also offer expanded capabilities with depth cameras! See our website for a complete list of compatible hardware.




Once calibrated, MixCast can communicate with almost any Unreal or Unity VR application to enable real-time mixed reality streaming and recording. From trailers, to livestreams, to tradeshow demos, and everything in between, mixed reality content is the best way to share virtual reality beyond the headset




You can download and integrate the MixCast SDK for free! Integration adds your title to the growing family of MixCast-compatible titles, and guarantees the best possible mixed reality results. (The best part: our devs are happy to help you out with questions or integration steps!) Download the SDK free from our website, and join the official Discord to chat with our devs.




While MixCast results are best when used with an SDK-integrated title, it can also be used with most Unity SteamVR titles, including:

  • Accounting+
  • Audioshield
  • Breaktime!
  • Climbey
  • Cosmic Trip
  • Cowbots and Aliens
  • Fruit Ninja VR
  • Job simulator
  • Rec Room
  • Richie's Plank Experience
  • Sairento Vr
  • Smashbox Arena
  • The Pierhead Arcade

For more information check out our official website!
883290.supported_languages:
英语*, 日语*, 韩语*, 简体中文*, 繁体中文*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 阿拉伯语*, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
